title: Longhorns Daily News : Texas WBB beats Illinois to advance to Sweet 16
body_text:
Texas Longhorns women’s basketball beat Illinois today in the NCAA Tournament’s Round of 32. Texas will now advances to the Sweet 16, where the team will face Tennessee this weekend. Texas women’s basketball has now advanced to the Sweet 16 in four of the past five seasons.
Longhorns Daily News: Texas WBB beats Illinois to advance to Sweet 16
Plus: Texas pitcher Dylan Volantis earns weekly SEC honor
